description: {"blocks":[{"key":"578tk","text":"This protocol describes the steps for performing a double chromogen staining using DAB and SK- 4700. Stained sections can subsequently be imaged and used for stereological cell quantification with Stereo Investigator software from MBF Bioscience or other Stereology software.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ejmfu","text":"Stop color reaction by washing sections for   in   PB on platform shaker (1/4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3qgjh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dkbvo","text":"Stop color reaction by washing sections for   in   PB on platform shaker (2/4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"71C289F4929C11EE8D460A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","duration":300,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"71C28A93929C11EE8D460A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"unit":21}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8sbpd","text":"Stop color reaction by washing sections for   in   PB on platform shaker (4/4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"79FB2236929C11EE8D460A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","duration":300,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"79FB22C6929C11EE8D460A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"unit":21}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aacf0","text":"Stop color reaction by washing sections for   in   PB on platform shaker (3/4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"75E03FA3929C11EE8D460A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","duration":300,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"75E0402F929C11EE8D460A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"unit":21}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"68utl","text":"Let slides cure for 2 days under a fume hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cqtqd","text":"Dispose of waste and excess reagents/solution according to institutional guidelines.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1q918","text":"Clean tools/working station.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6l166","text":"Microscopy slides should be stored in a designated container at room temperature until time of observation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"as8hk","text":"Turn on microscope and computer according to specific manuals/instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"99nv5","text":"Turn on MBF Stereo Investigator software.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5lp3t","text":"Load microscopy slides in the designated stage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aeuh0","text":"Use brightfield settings for imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a7liq","text":"Carefully follow all steps of the Stereo Investigator Workflow according to the manual. The workflow is step-by-step and very intuitive.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bacgf","text":"We typically use a 60x oil immersion lens for imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4p02r","text":"After cell counts have been collected export counting data into an excel sheet for further data analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"al96o","text":"Clean immersion objectives with a lens wipe and the appropriate cleaning solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6rqqb","text":"Turn off software/microscope/laser according to specific instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
